string.value: You're not a beginning anymore. Talk to Rain and take the Maple Quiz!
You're not a beginning anymore. Talk to Rain and take the Maple Quiz!
Rain's first question was about which hotkey to press to open the Item Inventory. The answer is I!

Hello! How're you liking Maple World so far? Let me give you a brief rundown of the place, and then I'll give you a quiz. If you answer my questions correctly, I'll give you something handy. Interested?
Hehe! Let me warn you, don't underestimate my quiz. There's a lot to learn, so pay attention!

You've hunted monsters already. Remember what keys you had to use? #bCtrl to attack#k and #bAlt to jump#k, right? And #bz to pick up the items? #nYou can also use the #rKey Config#k on the bottom right of your screen to recalibrate the buttons to your liking.

But what you haven't experienced yet is Job Advancement. To become a more powerful traveler, you need a job! To get one, you'll first have to leave this place, Maple Island, and head to Victoria Island. \nYou need to be at least at level #b10#k to become a Warrior, Bowman, or Thief, and at least level #b8#k to be a Magician. Each job has its pros and cons, so choose carefully.
I didn't tell you EVERYTHING you need to know for the quiz, so make sure to focus. Ready for the questions?
Hmm, you could learn a lot through my quiz. I think you should try it!

What do you press to open the item inventory? 

#L0##b I#l
#L1# K#l
#L2# S#l
#L3# E#k#l
That's right!! To open up the item inventory, you press #rI#k.
K is for the Skill Window. You'll be able to use skills once you get yourself a job. Don't you remember the shortcut key for the, ahem, i-tem inventory?
No, no. S is to check out your stats and your Ability Points. Come on, think!
Eh? E is to check out your equipment. Try again.
